q: from a briefing President Lyndon Johnson gave in 1966 on the Vietnam War and White House papers from July 1975-- when he was chief of staff under President Lyndon Johnson Gerald Ford -- with passages initialed by Donald Rumsfeld 's then-assistant, Dick Cheney . It's not a journal, it's not a diary, he says of the Gerald Ford White House notes.`` It is a set of working documents that I've never edited. In fact, most I've never reread.'' Toni Kukoc played like we expected him to play every game, Allen Iverson said.`` We need a lot of that from Toni Kukoc . He's one of those special players that can change a game.''
